title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. F, art. 3, pt. 621 - Home Relief Reimbursement Claiming
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. F, art. 3, pt. 621 - Home Relief Reimbursement Claiming

State Regulations
§ 621.1 - Reimbursement for home relief
§ 621.2 - Conditions for reimbursement for home relief

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. F, art. 3, pt. 621

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, §§131-a, 153, 153-c, 157, 158

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
